ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: He is - sorry.  High lev guilds take 2 and 3 groups in for this raid - and they are 40-50 level players. Sylly Songsynger  Bard of the 38th
ygData.messageBody:
He is - sorry. High lev guilds take 2 and 3 groups in for this raid - and
they are 40-50 level players.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 38th song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@...
[mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 10:56 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...

From: John_Senior@...

Hmm, I don't understand. How does this level 30 bard get to
the efreeti
with a group of 6? He sounds all tooooo tough for a group of
30's.




Greg Gillan <GGillan@...> on 14/12/99 16:40:13

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...




From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Efreeti is level 50. You have to get past a group of 6-8
imp protectors to
get to him (level 45+ I think). Boots and ring seem to drop
about the same
amount.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@...
[mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:50 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...


From: John_Senior@...

How hard is the Efreeti to kill, where does he spawn. And
how often does he
drop those Boots?
I've heard those Efreeti boots trade VERY highly - I've seen
mithril or
Ykesha's trade with that one.

Madagan Songweaver - Bard of 30 songs - Veeshan


> Although I like charm, and I like being able to kill hill
giants this
way,
> it really really sux in a party and is pretty darn boring
after the first
2
> or 3. I much prefer holding the bar room in Sol A, or
going after the
> Efreeti with a party of 6 to watching a couple of giants
beat on each
other.
> Solo'ing in my opinion just isn't very much fun and it is
just clearly
> boring compared to the non-stop action of a good dungeon.
Last weekend,
we
> did a Guild invasion of Sol A. We held a good portion of
the dungeon
with
> two well balanced parties of 6. A bard and snarer (ranger
or druid), a
> greater healer (shaman or cleric) and good tanks in each
party, excessive
> use of lullaby, hymn, anthem. Now that was TRULY what
this game is
supposed
> to be about!
>
> Taneran Dreamweaver
> <Clan Jax>
> Bard of the 31th song
> Prexus
